## Source: amazon-inspector (342de6f4f54c5a0a4df856c6dc87100b08337f11e82519b0cc2e99c90b26c9f0)
The package node-calculator-f4d5 was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (64e687d1fc2144f2d19f9e6ee10f4db75f7df024dccb7e96f382b53d3f84930c)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'node-calculator-f4d5' @ 2.3.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
